Posts.Content: tane05 wrote: hi all im 34 & 2 weeks ago i found a small lump under left my breast, its not sore, dosnt move, but after playin with it, it dose fell a little tender. over the last few months the same breast had been a bit sore, thought i had pulled a mussel but its on the top of my breast, i also get pain down my left arm. i went to dr yeasterday, she felt the lump & said that its not 1 there are bout 3 little ones together. then felt the rest of my breast & told me, i had extremly lumpy boobs i just thought this was normal as they are the only onces ive felt. anyway she felt around & put my hand on another lump the size of a golf ball. which is where the pain i get, where i thought it was just mussel pain. got a referral for utrasound and mamagram, but it only mentioned the origanal lump under the breast, so rung up to make an appointment, to find out i cant get in till the end of january. so now imÂ worried about how much the lump my grow. just cant understand y i have to wait 6 weeks Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: scared & have to wait 6 weeks tane05 Letlet
